general: Use formal tone. Maintain gender-neutral language.

locales.es: Use 'usted' form for formal address. Follow RAE guidelines.
locales.fr: Use 'vous' form. Follow Académie française guidelines.
locales.sv: Use 'du' form for informal address. Follow Svenska Akademiens ordlista guidelines.
locales.de: Use 'Sie' form for formal address. Follow Duden guidelines.
locales.it: Use 'Lei' form for formal address. Follow Accademia della Crusca guidelines.
locales.ja: Use polite form (です/ます). Follow NHK guidelines.
locales.zh: Use formal address. Follow Modern Chinese Dictionary guidelines.
locales.pt: Use 'você' form for informal address. Follow Priberam guidelines.
locales.ru: Use formal address. Follow Russian Academy of Sciences guidelines.
locales.ko: Use polite form (습니다/요). Follow National Institute of Korean Language guidelines.
locales.ar: Use formal address. Follow Academy of the Arabic Language guidelines.
